name: Heroes of Steam
description:
The first virtual reality Steampunk artillery shooter is here! Are you a super archer or good worms player? You will love this endless fun in the world of steam and gears. Go invite and clash your friends in this virtual battlefield. Upgrade your shield or cannon to the maximum to beat your opponents and be the hero in your social club! Aim to the sky and hit the enemy with your ammo and strike down the enemy defense!

- Steampunk design!
- Innovative aiming mechanism which is using your phone's gyroscope!
- Virtual reality generated terrain depending on your location!
- 50+ upgrade levels to research
- Compete with your friends & let them know who's the best!
- Social sharing functions!

Coming soon:
- More fortresses!
- More skins!
- Global Ranking based on your statistics.

Get it and invite your friends to play the ultimate war!

Have FUN!
